T12TD4295E:277b-1: wa tsa na mu kha yu dho pa ma n'a ma /
T12TD4295E:277b-3: smra ba'i sgo mtshon cha lta bu zhes bya ba /
T12TD4295E:277b-4: smra ba'i mchog thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T12TD4295E:277b-5: smra mchog gtso la phyag 'tshal nas //
T12TD4295E:277b-6: smra ba'i yan lag rdzogs don du //
T12TD4295E:277b-7: ngag gi 'du byed gang de yi //
T12TD4295E:277b-8: tshogs pa bdag gis bshad par bya //
T12TD4295E:277b-9: khog pa mgrin pa rkan dang lce //
T12TD4295E:277b-10: sna dang spyi bo so dang mchu //
T12TD4295E:277b-11: phyi dang re re'i cha dag las //
T12TD4295E:277b-12: phrad dang cung zad phrad pa dang //
T12TD4295E:277b-13: dog pa dang ni yangs pa nas //
T12TD4295E:277b-14: drang po bsgreng dang bkug pa dang //
T12TD4295E:277b-15: bstod pa dang ni smad pa dang //
T12TD4295E:277b-16: bsgrims dang glod pa'i nga ro 'byung //
T12TD4295E:277b-17: drang po bkug dang smad pa dang //
T12TD4295E:277b-18: bsgrims pa dang ni glong pa la //
T12TD4295E:277b-19: grvar dang tsvang gis phye ba dang //
T12TD4295E:277b-20: bsgreng dang bsgrengs te bkug pa dang //
T12TD4295E:277b-21: bstod dang bstod de smad pa dang //
T12TD4295E:277b-22: sna ldan rnam par gcad pa yis //
T12TD4295E:277b-23: nga ro bcu drug dag tu 'dod //
T12TD4295E:277b-24: nga ro dag gi gsal byed ni //
T12TD4295E:277b-25: drang po bkug dang smad pa la //
T12TD4295E:277b-26: 'dren pa ring thung gsum yod de //
T12TD4295E:277b-27: de la'ang che 'brid rnam pa gsum //
T12TD4295E:277b-28: de dgu sna ldan bco brgyad do //
T12TD4295E:277b-29: gsal bar bya ba 'di lta ste //
T12TD4295E:277b-30: bsgreng dang bstod la thung ba ste //
T12TD4295E:277b-31: bsgrims dang glod la ring ba'o //
T12TD4295E:277b-32: bcu gnyis yin te brgya rtsa gnyis //
T12TD4295E:277b-33: spyir na brgya dang bcu rtsa gcig / rang gnas dang ni bcu gnyis te //
T12TD4295E:277b-34: yi ge gcig gi rnam pa'i cha //
T12TD4295E:277b-36: dus gcig tu ni bcu gcig gam //
T12TD4295E:277b-37: sna ldan dang ni bcu gnyis te //
T12TD4295E:277b-38: rang gi gnas dang bcu gsum mo //
T12TD4295E:277b-39: mtshon 'debs gar dang las byed dang //
T12TD4295E:277b-40: stabs 'gros lta stangs bye brag dag //
T12TD4295E:277b-41: rkang lag mig gi 'gyur bag gi //
T12TD4295E:277b-42: lus kyi 'du byed bdun po ni //
T12TD4295E:277b-43: thad kar lta dang gyen du lta //
T12TD4295E:277b-44: de bzhin bzlog ste lta ba dang //
T12TD4295E:277b-45: bstod de lta dang smad de lta //
T12TD4295E:277b-46: bsgrims dang glod de lta ba ltar //
T12TD4295E:277b-47: gar la sogs pa'ang de bzhin te //
T12TD4295E:277b-48: lus kyi 'du byed bdun po ltar //
T12TD4295E:277b-49: ngag gi 'du byed de bzhin no //
T12TD4295E:277b-50: de ston dbyibs kyi gnas lugs kyang //
T12TD4295E:277b-51: mda' dang bse ru glang chen sna //
T12TD4295E:277b-52: gdugs dang rkang rten lta bu dang //
T12TD4295E:277b-53: me ri chu yi dkyil 'khor ltar //
T12TD4295E:277b-54: thad kar zur dang zur logs dang //
T12TD4295E:277b-55: steng 'og rang gi lus rnams la //
T12TD4295E:278a-3: lcags rnams la ni khab len bzhin //
T12TD4295E:278a-4: rnam rtog dbang gis gnas rnams g-yo //
T12TD4295E:278a-5: ji ltar gnas gzhi med bzhin du //
T12TD4295E:278a-6: mkha' la 'dab skyod rlung byung ltar //
T12TD4295E:278a-7: rnam par rtog pas bskyod pa na //
T12TD4295E:278a-8: b'a ya ta zhes bya ba'i rlung //
T12TD4295E:278a-9: lus la rab tu g-yo bar 'gyur //
T12TD4295E:278a-10: g-yo rlung rab tu g-yos ba yis //
T12TD4295E:278a-11: byed pa kun du bskyod pa na //
T12TD4295E:278a-12: dog dang yangs pa'i gnas rnams su //
T12TD4295E:278a-13: phrad dang cung zad phrad par byed //
T12TD4295E:278a-14: de tshe ni:shv'a s'a zhes pa'i //
T12TD4295E:278a-15: rlung dang lhan cig 'byung ba ste //
T12TD4295E:278a-16: ji ltar gzugs la 'byung ba bzhin //
T12TD4295E:278a-17: nga ro la ni brten bzhin du //
T12TD4295E:278a-18: rnam rtog rang gi snang cha las //
T12TD4295E:278a-19: gzugs brnyan bzhin du cha mnyam skye //
T12TD4295E:278a-20: gnas rnams dang ni byed pa dang //
T12TD4295E:278a-21: rnam par rtog dang rlung gnyis dang //
T12TD4295E:278a-22: nga ro gsal byed snang cha yis //
T12TD4295E:278a-23: ngag gi 'du byed kun du bskyed //
T12TD4295E:278a-24: rgyu bdun dag las 'byung ba ni //
T12TD4295E:278a-25: gnas rnams bzhi yi rgyu yin te //
T12TD4295E:278a-26: byed pa 'byin par byed pa'i rgyu //
T12TD4295E:278a-27: de bzhin rnam rtog bskul ba'i rgyu //
T12TD4295E:278a-28: ji ltar shing la rlung bzhin du //
T12TD4295E:278a-29: byed pa bskyod rgyu b'a ya ta'o //
T12TD4295E:278a-30: skyes bu dang ni bzhon pa bzhin //
T12TD4295E:278a-32: nga ro rnams dang gsal byed ni //
T12TD4295E:278a-33: kun du khyab par 'gro ba'i rgyu //
T12TD4295E:278a-35: skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu zhes bya //
T12TD4295E:278a-36: de la gdangs kyi bye brag ni //
T12TD4295E:278a-37: rgyu rnams dag gis phye ba ste //
T12TD4295E:278a-38: sngon du song bar rig par bya //
T12TD4295E:278a-39: de la rgyu dang rang bzhin ni //
T12TD4295E:278a-40: nga ro drang po las byung ba //
T12TD4295E:278a-41: ka sogs sde nas rim bzhin du //
T12TD4295E:278a-43: a'ushma na dang mthar zad de //
T12TD4295E:278a-44: gnas kyi yi ge sum cu bzhi //
T12TD4295E:278a-45: ming dang pho zhes bya ba ste //
T12TD4295E:278a-46: de la dang po'i sde pa dang //
T12TD4295E:278a-47: a'ushma na yi bzhi ba ni //
T12TD4295E:278a-48: bcad par bcas pa mgrin pa las //
T12TD4295E:278a-50: dang po aushma'i gsum pa rnams //
T12TD4295E:278a-51: rkan las rab tu 'byung ba yin //
T12TD4295E:278a-53: gnyis pa aushma'i gnyis pa rnams //
T12TD4295E:278a-54: spyi bo las ni rab tu 'byung //
T12TD4295E:278a-56: gsum pa aushma'i gsum pa rnams //
T12TD4295E:278a-57: so yi cha las kun du 'byung //
T12TD4295E:278a-59: bzhi pa mchu las byung ba yin //
T12TD4295E:278b-0: mthar zad @278b mgul dang spyi bo las //
T12TD4295E:278b-1: sde lnga dag las lnga lnga yang //
T12TD4295E:278b-2: dang po rang gnas drag pa ste //
T12TD4295E:278b-3: gnyis pa 'bring dang spyi bo'i cha //
T12TD4295E:278b-4: gsum pa rnams ni zhan pa ste //
T12TD4295E:278b-5: ma h'a pra' na zhes bya ba //
T12TD4295E:278b-6: bzhi pa rang gnas khong nas so //
T12TD4295E:278b-7: aa nu sva ra zhes bya ba //
T12TD4295E:278b-8: lnga pa rang gnas sna nas 'byung //
T12TD4295E:278b-9: mgul pa sna dang gla dang pa'i sbubs //
T12TD4295E:278b-10: dog pa yin te yangs ba gzhan //
T12TD4295E:278b-11: rkan dang so dang lce dang mchu //
T12TD4295E:278b-12: phrad pa yin te gzhan zhes bya //
T12TD4295E:278b-13: gnas cha'i yi ge ji snyed kyang //
T12TD4295E:278b-14: nga ro gcig gis bcings pa la //
T12TD4295E:278b-15: dela'ang yi ge gcig ces brjod //
T12TD4295E:278b-16: shin tu phra ba'i rnam pa'i cha //
T12TD4295E:278b-17: de la'ang yi ge gcig ces bya //
T12TD4295E:278b-19: aalpa pra' na gnyis gcig yin //
T12TD4295E:278b-20: ma h'a pra' na gcig nyid yin //
T12TD4295E:278b-21: aa nu sva ra rngub pa'i sgra //
T12TD4295E:278b-23: hra sva tha mal sgra yin te //
T12TD4295E:278b-24: d'i rgha ta ni gnyis kyi yun //
T12TD4295E:278b-25: plu ta ni de bzhin gsum //
T12TD4295E:278b-26: au d'atta ni mtshungs gnyis gcig / aa nu d'atta phyed cha yin //
T12TD4295E:278b-27: sva ri ta ni rang sgra 'o //
T12TD4295E:278b-28: sna ldan aa nu sva ra'i cha //
T12TD4295E:278b-29: aa ldan aa med ces bya ba //
T12TD4295E:278b-30: che ba dag dang chung ba'i ming //
T12TD4295E:278b-31: drang po dag la ji lta ba //
T12TD4295E:278b-32: nga ro gzhan la'ang de bzhin te //
T12TD4295E:278b-33: de la cung zad gnas cha ni //
T12TD4295E:278b-34: rkan dang mgul pa'i cha dag las //
T12TD4295E:278b-35: bsgreng dang bkug pa'i nga ro 'byung //
T12TD4295E:278b-36: de bzhin mchu las bstod smad do //
T12TD4295E:278b-37: bsgrims pa spyi bo'i cha las te //
T12TD4295E:278b-38: glod pa dag ni so yin no //
T12TD4295E:278b-39: 'di dag gis ni bcings pa na //
T12TD4295E:278b-40: cha ni sngon du brjod pa bzhin //
T12TD4295E:278b-41: mi de mu do ri li yi //
T12TD4295E:278b-42: sgra yi cha dang ci rigs sbyar //
T12TD4295E:278b-43: aa yi cha ni mdun du dpyad //
T12TD4295E:278b-44: lhag ma rnam pa'i cha zhes bya //
T12TD4295E:278b-45: de dag re re'i cha yin te //
T12TD4295E:278b-46: gang yang phan tshun brten pa ni //
T12TD4295E:278b-47: kun du khyab phyir spyi yi cha //
T12TD4295E:278b-48: de dag yi ge'i bye brag ste //
T12TD4295E:278b-49: rnam grangs du ma med pa dang //
T12TD4295E:278b-50: ming tshig gsal bar byed pa dang //
T12TD4295E:278b-51: don rnams rjod par byed pa'i phyir //
T12TD4295E:278b-52: yi ge zhes ni brjod pa yin //
T12TD4295E:278b-53: rang bzhin las dang dgos ched kyi //
T12TD4295E:278b-54: nges tshig yin te go rims bzhin //
T12TD4295E:278b-55: tshogs dang lus dang 'dus pa ni //
T12TD4295E:278b-56: rnam grangs dag ste de bzhin sbyar //
T12TD4295E:278b-57: ji ltar rdul las gong bu bzhin //
T12TD4295E:278b-58: yi ge 'dus par gyur pa na //
T12TD4295E:278b-60: gang zhig rnam cha 'dus pa yis //
T12TD4295E:279a-2: rnam cha mang ngam nyung gyur kyang //
T12TD4295E:279a-3: de ni ming zhes rab tu brjod //
T12TD4295E:279a-4: de yang ming gi thog ma dang //
T12TD4295E:279a-5: rjes su grub pa rnam pa gnyis //
T12TD4295E:279a-6: thog ma 'dod rgyal ming yin te //
T12TD4295E:279a-7: rjes grub dag ni don ldan dang //
T12TD4295E:279a-8: rnam pa gnyis kar 'dod pa yin //
T12TD4295E:279a-9: de ni nges tshig yod med do //
T12TD4295E:279a-10: gang zhig gzhan la ma brten par //
T12TD4295E:279a-11: bla dgas gang byas thog ma'o //
T12TD4295E:279a-12: de la brten pa rjes grub pa //
T12TD4295E:279a-14: 'dod rgyal dag tu mtshungs mod kyi //
T12TD4295E:279a-15: ma brten phyir na grub pa ste //
T12TD4295E:279a-16: ming gzhan gang la'ang ma brten pa //
T12TD4295E:279a-17: gzhan gyis 'gal ba med phyir ro //
T12TD4295E:279a-18: 'thad par sgrub pa'i rigs pa dag / chos nyid la ni brten pa bzhin //
T12TD4295E:279a-19: don ldan ming yang de bzhin du //
T12TD4295E:279a-20: 'dod rgyal thog ma nyid la brten //
T12TD4295E:279a-21: rjes su grub pa'i 'dod rgyal ni //
T12TD4295E:279a-22: log par sgrub phyir nges tshig bzhag /'dod rgyal thog ma'i ming gang yin //
T12TD4295E:279a-23: nges tshig gzhi med chos nyid bzhin //
T12TD4295E:279a-24: de ldan don ldan nges tshig ni //
T12TD4295E:279a-25: de yin phyir dang de yod phyir //
T12TD4295E:279a-26: de la phan phyir de byed phyir //
T12TD4295E:279a-27: de bya'i phyir dang de 'dra'i phyir //
T12TD4295E:279a-28: de de'i phyir dang de nyid phyir //
T12TD4295E:279a-29: de yi ming ni de skad ces //
T12TD4295E:279a-30: rtogs kyi sgo 'am med kyang rung //
T12TD4295E:279a-31: skabs kyi mthu yis nges tshig brjod //
T12TD4295E:279a-32: yin dang ngo bo bsgrub ba dang //
T12TD4295E:279a-33: dngos po'i rkyen ni dngos kyi ming //
T12TD4295E:279a-34: lhag ma btags pa zhes bya'o //
T12TD4295E:279a-35: rang gi ngo bo'i nges tshig dang //
T12TD4295E:279a-36: btags pa'i ming gzhan spong byed dang //
T12TD4295E:279a-37: rang gi khyad par gzhan sel bas //
T12TD4295E:279a-38: yin dang ngo bo sgrub pa dang //
T12TD4295E:279a-39: dngos po'i rkyen rnams go rims bzhin //
T12TD4295E:279a-40: rten la brten pa btags pa dang //
T12TD4295E:279a-41: brgyud pa'i rgyu la 'bras bu dang //
T12TD4295E:279a-42: dngos kyi rgyu la de bzhin dang //
T12TD4295E:279a-43: 'bras bu'am bya bar gyur pa la //
T12TD4295E:279a-44: de la rgyu yi ming btags pa'am //
T12TD4295E:279a-45: dpe gzhan gyi ni ming dag dang //
T12TD4295E:279a-46: don 'di dag gi sgo nas ni //
T12TD4295E:279a-47: yod dang de la phan pa dang //
T12TD4295E:279a-48: byed dang las su bsgrub pa dang //
T12TD4295E:279a-49: 'dra bar sbyar dang rim bzhin no //
T12TD4295E:279a-52: de dag khyad par rjod byed na //
T12TD4295E:279a-53: tshig ces rab tu brjod pa ste //
T12TD4295E:279a-54: phrad rnams dag dang bcas pa'ang yin //
T12TD4295E:279a-55: de la tshig gi sbyor ba bcu //
T12TD4295E:279a-56: 'bru mang po dang tshig sdud dang //
T12TD4295E:279b-0: khyad par @279b dag dang yan lag dang //
T12TD4295E:279b-1: gzhi dang gzhi gcig bsdu ba dang //
T12TD4295E:279b-2: gzhi mthun pa dang de'i skyes bu //
T12TD4295E:279b-3: zlas dbye ba dang phyogs tsam mo //
T12TD4295E:279b-4: tshig gnyis mang po'i rab dbye ba //
T12TD4295E:279b-5: rang ming ldan dang mi ldan dang //
T12TD4295E:279b-6: phyogs dang rnam grangs phan tshun dang //
T12TD4295E:279b-7: tshig mang po ste rnam mang po //
T12TD4295E:279b-8: mthun dang tha dad dbye ba yis //
T12TD4295E:279b-9: phyogs kun dang ni phyogs gcig las //
T12TD4295E:279b-10: rab tu dbye ba bzhir 'dod do //
T12TD4295E:279b-11: byed pa drug gis sbyar ba ni //
T12TD4295E:279b-12: kun la rab tu ldan pa sta //
T12TD4295E:279b-13: brgya dang drug cu rtsa brgyad las //
T12TD4295E:279b-14: dus gcig tu ni sum ldan gzung //
T12TD4295E:279b-15: tshig bsdu ba ni rnam pa lnga //
T12TD4295E:279b-16: gnyis dang rnam grangs bye brag dang //
T12TD4295E:279b-17: gzhan dang byed pa'i tshig yin no //
T12TD4295E:279b-18: las la sogs pa'i dbye ba yis //
T12TD4295E:279b-19: gnyis pa la sogs bdun pa'i mtha' //
T12TD4295E:279b-20: byed pa drug tu 'dod pa ste //
T12TD4295E:279b-21: tshig sdud tsam du shes par bya //
T12TD4295E:279b-22: snga ma phyi ma'i sbyor ba yis //
T12TD4295E:279b-23: khyad par bsdu ba rnams pa gnyis //
T12TD4295E:279b-24: 'brel pa dag dang go rims dang //
T12TD4295E:279b-25: don dang grags pa'i yan lag ni //
T12TD4295E:279b-26: bsdu ba bzhi'o grags pa yang //
T12TD4295E:279b-27: 'jig rten bstan bcos dag la gnyis //
T12TD4295E:279b-28: rigs gsal byas dang ma byas pa'i //
T12TD4295E:279b-29: gzhi bsdu ba ni gnyis yin no //
T12TD4295E:279b-30: phyogs gcig dag tu byed pa dang //
T12TD4295E:279b-31: so so phyogs gcig byed pa yis //
T12TD4295E:279b-32: gzhi gcig bsdu ba gnyis su'o //
T12TD4295E:279b-33: khyad par khyad par can gnyis dang //
T12TD4295E:279b-34: khyad par rnam gnyis gzhi gcig tu //
T12TD4295E:279b-35: mthun par go bar bya ba la //
T12TD4295E:279b-36: sbyor ba'i gzhi mthun rnam pa gnyis /
T12TD4295E:279b-37: ngo bo 'am ni chos kyang rung //
T12TD4295E:279b-38: tha dad go bar byed ba yi //
T12TD4295E:279b-39: de yi skyes bu gsum yin te //
T12TD4295E:279b-40: byed pa'i tshig dang las 'dzin dang //
T12TD4295E:279b-41: ba gnyis pa zhes bya ba'o //
T12TD4295E:279b-42: de la byed pa brgyad yin te //
T12TD4295E:279b-43: dang po la sogs bdun pa'i mtha' //
T12TD4295E:279b-44: rnam dbye sbyor ba bdun po dang //
T12TD4295E:279b-45: phrad dang sbyor ba bral ba'i phyir //
T12TD4295E:279b-46: gzhan dang sbyor med bod pa spang //
T12TD4295E:279b-47: dgag pa dang ni brgyad du 'dod //
T12TD4295E:279b-48: mtshan nyid dbang gis phye ba yis //
T12TD4295E:279b-49: ma yin dgag pa bcu bzhi dang //
T12TD4295E:279b-50: mtshan nyid dbye ba med mod kyi //
T12TD4295E:279b-51: yul dang dus kyi phye ba yis //
T12TD4295E:279b-52: med par dgag pa bcu gcig dag / gang ldan dgag par 'dod pa'o //
T12TD4295E:279b-53: gzhan dang mi mthun gnyen po dang //
T12TD4295E:280a-2: yun thung lhag ma med pa dang //
T12TD4295E:280a-3: mtha' dag min dang bral ba dang //
T12TD4295E:280a-4: dman dang zhan dang zhum pa dang //
T12TD4295E:280a-5: 'dra ba dag las dgag pa ni //
T12TD4295E:280a-7: rgyu 'dra ba dang rang bzhin dang //
T12TD4295E:280a-8: skabs dang rten gyi dbye ba yis //
T12TD4295E:280a-9: snga dang zhig nas med pa dang //
T12TD4295E:280a-10: dbye ba rnam pa brgyad yin te //
T12TD4295E:280a-11: phan tshun dag la rnag bzhin dang //
T12TD4295E:280a-12: rgyu dang rang bzhin gnyis dbye ba'i //
T12TD4295E:280a-13: shin tu med dang bcu gcig ni //
T12TD4295E:280a-15: kun tu ldog phyir dgag pa yin //
T12TD4295E:280a-16: de nyid gzhan du mi brjod dang //
T12TD4295E:280a-17: 'dra ba gzhan dang bye brag gi //
T12TD4295E:280a-18: tshig sbyor dbye ba las 'dzin no //
T12TD4295E:280a-19: grangs dang bsdus don sbyor ba yis //
T12TD4295E:280a-20: gcig dang tha dad sbyor byed pa //
T12TD4295E:280a-22: bsdu pa'i phyir dang dbye phyir dang //
T12TD4295E:280a-23: nye bar tha dad sbyor ba'i phyir //
T12TD4295E:280a-24: 'das ma thag dang gzhan dag dang //
T12TD4295E:280a-25: lan grangs gzhan la sbyor byed pa //
T12TD4295E:280a-26: zlas dbye ba zhes 'dod pa yin //
T12TD4295E:280a-27: rang gi rigs tsam sdud byed cing //
T12TD4295E:280a-28: phyogs gzhan kun du spong ba dang //
T12TD4295E:280a-29: rigs kyi tshad kyang mi 'dzin pa //
T12TD4295E:280a-30: phyogs tsam ston pa'i sbyor ba'o //
T12TD4295E:280a-31: gang zhig rang gi don med cing //
T12TD4295E:280a-32: don gyi ming la gsal byed pa //
T12TD4295E:280a-33: tshig gi phrad ces bya ba ste ;
T12TD4295E:280a-34: / de ldan phrad dang bcas pa yin //
T12TD4295E:280a-35: de la phrad kyi 'jug pa ni //
T12TD4295E:280a-36: gang ni 'dri ba'i tshig gi don //
T12TD4295E:280a-37: spyi la khyab par sbyor ba ste //
T12TD4295E:280a-38: zla sdud pa la kun du spang //
T12TD4295E:280a-39: ci la sogs pa 'ang de bzhin te //
T12TD4295E:280a-40: khyab pa skabs kyis brtsi bar bya //
T12TD4295E:280a-41: de zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don //
T12TD4295E:280a-42: tha snyad dngos dang dus 'jug gsum //
T12TD4295E:280a-43: 'das dang rnam grangs gzhan can dang //
T12TD4295E:280a-44: lhag ma dag dang bcas pa'o //
T12TD4295E:280a-45: bden pa dag dang gsang ba dang //
T12TD4295E:280a-46: bdag gi ba dang pha rol po //
T12TD4295E:280a-47: dngos po dag la 'jug pa bzhi //
T12TD4295E:280a-49: dus gnyis la ni 'jug pa gnyis //
T12TD4295E:280a-50: bdag nyid da ltar nyid la spang //
T12TD4295E:280a-51: dngos po'i dus ni mi 'dor te //
T12TD4295E:280a-52: kun la rab tu sbyar bar bya //
T12TD4295E:280a-54: skabs kyi dngos gzhan dag la 'jug / gang zhig la ni ltos byas pa'i //
T12TD4295E:280a-55: nye ba dag dang mngon sum pa'i //
T12TD4295E:280a-56: dngos po dag kyang gnyis yin no //
T12TD4295E:280b-0: @280b spang bar bya ba 'di lta ste //
T12TD4295E:280b-1: lkog tu gyur dang ring ba dang //
T12TD4295E:280b-2: gal te bstan bya dus nyid na //
T12TD4295E:280b-4: de rnams kun la bsgyur ba ldan //
T12TD4295E:280b-5: da ni skabs su bab pa'i tshig / da ltar byung la sbyor ba ste //
T12TD4295E:280b-6: 'das pa'i skabs la rnam par spang //
T12TD4295E:280b-7: na zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don //
T12TD4295E:280b-8: dmigs kyis 'byed dang rgyu mtshan dang //
T12TD4295E:280b-9: rgyu mtshan don gyis bstan pa dang //
T12TD4295E:280b-10: las dang ched dang rten gnas dang //
T12TD4295E:280b-11: phyi tshig de gzhan sogs ston dang //
T12TD4295E:280b-13: phyir tshig nges par byed pa dang //
T12TD4295E:280b-14: de las bzlog pa nyid dang ni ;
T12TD4295E:280b-16: smon dang 'dri dang the tshom gzhi //
T12TD4295E:280b-17: tshe skabs rnams la 'di mthong ngo //
T12TD4295E:280b-18: ste ni lhag ma yod pa ste //
T12TD4295E:280b-19: mtshams sbyor ba dang dam 'cha' dang //
T12TD4295E:280b-21: byed dang bya ba'am yang na ni //
T12TD4295E:280b-22: bya ba nyid du sbyor ba gang ;
T12TD4295E:280b-23: / tshig gnyis rim mam dus gcig tu //
T12TD4295E:280b-24: sbyor bar byed pa mtshams sbyor yin //
T12TD4295E:280b-25: gang zhig gis ni snga ma la //
T12TD4295E:280b-26: gang zhig gis ni sna ma la //
T12TD4295E:280b-27: gsal bar byed pa dam 'cha' ba //
T12TD4295E:280b-28: lhag ma yod tsam ston gyur cing //
T12TD4295E:280b-29: de las gzhan gyur gzhan 'dren pa'o //
T12TD4295E:280b-30: da ni 'byed dang sdud pa dang //
T12TD4295E:280b-31: rgyu mtshan tshe skabs gdams ngag lnga //
T12TD4295E:280b-32: de nyid dang ni gzhan dag dang //
T12TD4295E:280b-33: de nyid dang ni gzhan dag dang //
T12TD4295E:280b-34: lan grangs gzhan la sbyor ba yi //
T12TD4295E:280b-35: sdud pa'i dang yang gsum du 'dod //
T12TD4295E:280b-36: ni ni dgar dang bsnan pa'i tshig / dmigs sam nges par 'dzin pa ste //
T12TD4295E:280b-37: phyi ma'i tshig dang sbyar bar bya //
T12TD4295E:280b-38: kyang dang yang ni sdud pa'i tshig /
T12TD4295E:280b-39: mi mthun mthun par ston pa'ang yin //
T12TD4295E:280b-41: ci rigs dag tu bsdu bar bya //
T12TD4295E:280b-42: ci rigs dag tu bsdu bar bya //
T12TD4295E:280b-43: yang zhes bya ba bsnan pa yin //
T12TD4295E:280b-44: nges par gzung ba'i tshig gi don //
T12TD4295E:280b-45: gzhan mi ldan dang gzhan la min //
T12TD4295E:280b-46: ldan pa tsam du 'dzin ba dang //
T12TD4295E:280b-47: ma nges pa ni rnam pa gnyis //
T12TD4295E:280b-48: bden zhing mi slu ba nyid dang //
T12TD4295E:280b-49: kho na dag ni rnam pa drug / nyid ni de bzhin cung zad du //
T12TD4295E:280b-50: phyi tshig tha dad min pa dang //
T12TD4295E:280b-54: tsam zhes bya ba rnam pa gnyis //
T12TD4295E:280b-55: 'bab zhig la sogs de bzhin sbyar //
T12TD4295E:281a-1: pa skabs kyis brtsi bar bya //
T12TD4295E:281a-2: yang dag yongs su kun du sogs //
T12TD4295E:281a-3: sgra bzhin dang ni phrad du'o //
T12TD4295E:281a-4: tshul ni 'dra dang smad pa dang //
T12TD4295E:281a-5: sgo dang sdom pa mtshan nyid dang //
T12TD4295E:281a-6: thabs dang rigs pa don dang 'dod //
T12TD4295E:281a-7: legs pa dag la 'jug pa las //
T12TD4295E:281a-9: bzhin la sogs pa'i tshig gi don //
T12TD4295E:281a-10: ma nor ba dang yin pa dang //
T12TD4295E:281a-12: cing la sogs pa bsdu ba dang //
T12TD4295E:281a-13: mtshams sbyor dag tu byed pa yin //
T12TD4295E:281a-14: lan gnyis pa bzhi pa dang //
T12TD4295E:281a-15: bdun pa sdud dang sbyor ba dang //
T12TD4295E:281a-16: smon dang tshad 'dzin gzhi dang ni //
T12TD4295E:281a-17: tshe skabs dag tu 'dod pa yin //
T12TD4295E:281a-18: kyi ni 'brel pa'i don yin te //
T12TD4295E:281a-19: kyis ni byed par 'dod pa yin //
T12TD4295E:281a-20: mi mthun rgyan ni gsum char la'o //
T12TD4295E:281a-21: las ni rgyu dang 'byung khungs dang //
T12TD4295E:281a-22: dgar ba yin te nas de bzhin //
T12TD4295E:281a-23: sdud pa dag dang mtshams sbyor ni //
T12TD4295E:281a-24: nas la cung zad lhag pa yin //
T12TD4295E:281a-25: gtan tshigs dag tu 'gyur ba ni //
T12TD4295E:281a-26: drug pa 'ba' zhig ma gtogs pa'o //
T12TD4295E:281a-27: du la sogs pa la dang mthun //
T12TD4295E:281a-28: de nyid dag ni lhag pa yin //
T12TD4295E:281a-29: de bzhin lhag bcas la la'o //
T12TD4295E:281a-30: 'o la sogs pa zla sdud pa'o //
T12TD4295E:281a-31: 'o na khong du chud pa'i tshig /'am zhes bya ba 'byed sdud yin //
T12TD4295E:281a-32: dag dang rnams ni mang po'i tshig //
T12TD4295E:281a-33: sogs ni mtha' dag sdud pa yin //
T12TD4295E:281a-35: ldan pa'i don du sbyar bar bya //
T12TD4295E:281a-36: ba ni spyi ru gzhag pa ste //
T12TD4295E:281a-37: yul du nges par ma bzung ba'o //
T12TD4295E:281a-38: za ba bza' dang za po bzhin //
T12TD4295E:281a-39: ma ning dag tu gzhag par bya //
T12TD4295E:281a-41: yang na mang po 'dus pa na //
T12TD4295E:281a-42: snga phyi phan tshun zil gnon dang //
T12TD4295E:281a-43: rang gi cha ldan dag tu sbyar //
T12TD4295E:281a-44: gang la dmigs 'dzin mi byed dang //
T12TD4295E:281a-45: dmigs 'dzin te na phrad gyur na //
T12TD4295E:281a-46: gnyis par gyur pa'i mthu bzhin no //
T12TD4295E:281a-47: phyogs gcig khong du chud pa las //
T12TD4295E:281a-48: phyogs gcig 'dri par byed pa ni //
T12TD4295E:281a-50: de la dmigs 'dzin snga ma bzhin //
T12TD4295E:281a-51: gzhan 'dren byed pa de yin te //
T12TD4295E:281a-52: na yis phyogs gcig dag tu byed //
T12TD4295E:281a-53: de gnyis ldan pa'i phrad rnams ni //
T12TD4295E:281a-54: dmigs 'dzin ldan mi ldan gnyis te //
T12TD4295E:281a-55: snga ma don gyis bsdu bar bya //
T12TD4295E:281b-0: yod na snga @281b ma dngos su bsdu //
T12TD4295E:281b-1: gal te ji ste 'on te dad //
T12TD4295E:281b-2: de ste na zhes bya bar sbyar //
T12TD4295E:281b-4: bsdu ba gnyis ldan gnyis bsdu bya //
T12TD4295E:281b-5: mthun dang tha dad skabs kyi mthu //
T12TD4295E:281b-6: gang ltar ji ltar de ltar dang //
T12TD4295E:281b-7: de bzhin de skad la sogs pa //
T12TD4295E:281b-8: ji skad bsnan pa'i cha gnyis ldan //
T12TD4295E:281b-9: de la sogs pa'i phrad rnams kun //
T12TD4295E:281b-10: zil gnon gyur tam cha ldan yang //
T12TD4295E:281b-11: dgos pa re rer dril byas te //
T12TD4295E:281b-12: don tshig sbyor ba bcu po dag / phrad kyi sbyor ba ji lta ba //
T12TD4295E:281b-14: mang po 'dus par gyur kyang rung //
T12TD4295E:281b-15: de ldan lhag pa mi ston phyir //
T12TD4295E:281b-16: skabs dang tshig shugs brtags nas ni //
T12TD4295E:281b-17: blo ldan rnams kyis gang rigs sbyar //
T12TD4295E:281b-18: dper na skyes bu gang zhig gis //
T12TD4295E:281b-19: gzugs kyi bye brag shes 'dod na //
T12TD4295E:281b-20: phra rdul chos la mtshan nyid du //
T12TD4295E:281b-21: de shes che rdul gong bu dang //
T12TD4295E:281b-22: gong chen dag gi mtshan nyid dang //
T12TD4295E:281b-23: las rnams 'bad pa med par shes //
T12TD4295E:281b-24: de shes skabs kyi bya ba gang //
T12TD4295E:281b-25: sbyor ba dag la mi 'jigs bzhin //
T12TD4295E:281b-26: skyes bu smra bar 'dod pa yis //
T12TD4295E:281b-27: gzhi mtha'i yi ge'i bye brag dag / legs par khong du chud pa na //
T12TD4295E:281b-28: de 'dus ming dang de bzhin tshig / shlok dang ni rab byed sogs //
T12TD4295E:281b-29: ming tshig yi ge mtshungs pa'i phyir //
T12TD4295E:281b-31: de phyir 'di ni bslab nas shes //
T12TD4295E:281b-32: smra mchog rjes smra rnams kyis bshad //
T12TD4295E:281b-33: don la 'jug byed smra ba rnams kyi sgo //
T12TD4295E:281b-34: blo 'byed gti mug gcod pas mtshon cha 'dra //
T12TD4295E:281b-35: mi 'jigs snyems pa sbyin byed dpung dang go //
T12TD4295E:281b-36: don nor smra bas mi nyams brtan pa'i mkhar //
T12TD4295E:281b-37: smra mchog rjes smra rnams kyis rjes smras pas //
T12TD4295E:281b-38: sgra nyid dang ni don la 'khrid pa yi //
T12TD4295E:281b-39: 'gro kun mthu gnyis rab tu rgyas par shog / pandi ta dran pa ye shes grags pas mdzad pa smra pa'i sgo mtshon cha lta bu zhes bya ba rdzogs so /
T12TD4295E:281b-42: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dran pa'i ye shes grags pas //
T12TD4295E:281b-43: bla ma nor bzangs grags pa las thos te /
T12TD4295E:281b-44: slob ma gzhon nu grags pa'i don du //
T12TD4295E:281b-45: ming gi sbyor ba ni cung zad gzhag / phrad kyi sbyor ba ni cung zad bshad nas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o /
